message: Since doctrine/mongodb-odm 2.4: Passing $entityClass argument to Doctrine\ODM\MongoDB\Event\OnClearEventArgs::Doctrine\ODM\MongoDB\Event\OnClearEventArgs::__construct() is deprecated and will not be supported in Doctrine ODM 3.0.
